Portfolio.title: My Portfolio
Portfolio.desc: A collection of my projects and experiments.
Portfolio.project1Desc: A multilingual community site built with Next.js and i18n. Secure authentication with NextAuth.
Portfolio.project2Desc: Intelligent chatbot developed using LangChain and OpenAI API for context-aware conversations.
Portfolio.project3Desc: A dashboard allowing team members to share and edit data in real-time using Vue.js and Firebase.
Portfolio.project4Desc: Visualizes high-volume data received via WebSocket into real-time charts using D3.js.
Portfolio.project5Desc: A mobile cryptocurrency wallet built with React Native, supporting Ethereum and Solana networks.
Portfolio.project6Desc: Collects sensor data via MQTT and visualizes it with InfluxDB and Grafana.
Portfolio.project7Desc: Built a voice assistant service with natural language processing using TensorFlow and Dialogflow.
Portfolio.project8Desc: A scalable online shopping platform integrated with Stripe payment system.
Portfolio.project9Desc: A B2B SaaS application with integrated user management and recurring billing.

About.title: About Me
About.subtitle: Passionate Developer & Engineer
About.intro: I am a full-stack developer with a background in embedded systems. I love building things that live on the internet and in the physical world.
About.job1Desc: Leading the firmware development team for IoT smart home devices.
About.job2Desc: Developed low-power sensor nodes and implemented mesh networking protocols.
